089/**
090 *  Parses an XML CLI definition file.
091 *
092 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
093 *  @version $Id: CLIDefinitionParser.java 1061 2023-09-25 16:32:43Z tquadrat $
094 *  @since 0.0.1
095 *
096 *  @UMLGraph.link
097 */
098@SuppressWarnings( {"OverlyComplexClass", "ClassWithTooManyMethods"} )
099@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: CLIDefinitionParser.java 1061 2023-09-25 16:32:43Z tquadrat $" )
100@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.1" )
101public final class CLIDefinitionParser
102{
103        /*---------------*\
104    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
105        \*---------------*/
106    /**
107     *  An implementation of
108     *  {@link Location}.
109     *  that is based on an instance of
110     *  {@link SAXParseException}.
111     *
112     *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
113     *  @version $Id: CLIDefinitionParser.java 1061 2023-09-25 16:32:43Z tquadrat $
114     *  @since 0.0.1
115     *
116     *  @UMLGraph.link
117     */
118    @ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: CLIDefinitionParser.java 1061 2023-09-25 16:32:43Z tquadrat $" )
119    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.1" )
120    public static final class ExceptionLocation implements Location
121    {
122            /*------------*\
123        ====** Attributes **===================================================
124            \*------------*/
125        /**
126         *  The exception that provides the data.
127         */
128        private final SAXParseException m_Exception;
129
130            /*--------------*\
131        ====** Constructors **=================================================
132            \*--------------*/
133        /**
134         *  Creates a new {@code ExceptionLocation} instance from the given
135         *  instance of
136         *  {@link SAXParseException}.
137         *
138         *  @param  exception   The exception.
139         */
140        public ExceptionLocation( final SAXParseException exception ) { m_Exception = requireNonNullArgument( exception, "exception" ); }
141
142            /*---------*\
143        ====** Methods **==========================================================
144            \*---------*/
145        /**
146         *  {@inheritDoc}
147         */
148        @Override
149        public final int getCharacterOffset() { return -1; }
150
151        /**
152         *  {@inheritDoc}
153         */
154        @Override
155        public final int getColumnNumber() {return m_Exception.getColumnNumber(); }
156
157        /**
158         *  {@inheritDoc}
159         */
160        @Override
161        public final int getLineNumber() {return m_Exception.getLineNumber(); }
162
163        /**
164         *  {@inheritDoc}
165         */
166        @Override
167        public final String getPublicId() {return m_Exception.getPublicId(); }
168
169        /**
170         *  {@inheritDoc}
171         */
172        @Override
173        public final String getSystemId()  {return m_Exception.getSystemId(); }
174    }
175    //  class ExceptionLocation
176
177    /**
178     *  An implementation of
179     *  {@link XMLResolver}
180     *  for this parser.
181     *
182     *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
183     *  @version $Id: CLIDefinitionParser.java 1061 2023-09-25 16:32:43Z tquadrat $
184     *  @since 0.0.1
185     *
186     *  @UMLGraph.link
187     */
188    @ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: CLIDefinitionParser.java 1061 2023-09-25 16:32:43Z tquadrat $" )
189    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.1" )
190    private static class CLIDefinitionResolver implements XMLResolver
191    {
192            /*--------------*\
193        ====** Constructors **=================================================
194            \*--------------*/
195        /**
196         *  Creates a new instance of {@code CLIDefinitionResolver}.
197         */
198        public CLIDefinitionResolver() { /* Just exists */ }
199
200            /*---------*\
201        ====** Methods **======================================================
202            \*---------*/
203        /**
204         *  {@inheritDoc}
205         */
206        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfSystemOutOrSystemErr" )
207        @Override
208        public final Object resolveEntity( final String publicID, final String systemID, final String baseURI, final String namespace ) throws XMLStreamException
209        {
210            Object retValue = null;
211
212            if( CLI_DEFINITION_DTD.equals( systemID ) )
213            {
214                retValue = retrieveCLIDefinitionDTD();
215            }
216            else
217            {
218                out.printf( "PublicID = %s%n", publicID );
219                out.printf( "SystemID = %s%n", systemID );
220                out.printf( "BaseURI = %s%n", baseURI );
221                out.printf( "Namespace = %s%n", namespace );
222            }
223
224            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
225            return retValue;
226        } // resolveEntity()
227    }
228    //  class CLIDefinitionResolver
229
230        /*-----------*\
231    ====** Constants **========================================================
232        \*-----------*/
233    /**
234     *  The name for the CLI definition DTD file: {@value}.
235     */
236    @SuppressWarnings( "StaticMethodOnlyUsedInOneClass" )
237    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.1" )
238    public static final String CLI_DEFINITION_DTD = "CLIDefinition.dtd";
239
240    /**
241     *  The name for the CLI definition XSD file: {@value}.

244    public static final String CLI_DEFINITION_XSD = "CLIDefinition.xsd";

279        '%3$s' does not match the expected '%2$s'
280        """;

296     *  encountered: {@value}.

299

301     *  The message indicating that an unexpected start element was
302     *  encountered: {@value}.

304    public static final String MSG_WrongElement2 = "Encountered '%2$s' while expected one of: %1$s";

381        /*------------*\
382    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
383        \*------------*/
384    /**
385     *  The XML event reader that provides the CLI definition.
386     */
387    private final XMLEventReader m_EventReader;
388
389    /**
390     *  The property map.
391     */
392    private final Map<String,Object> m_PropertyMap;
393
394    /**
395     *  The XML stream.
396     */
397    private final String m_XMLContents;
398
399        /*--------------*\
400    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
401        \*--------------*/
402    /**
403     *  Creates a new {@code CLIDefinitionParser} instance.
404     *
405     *  @param  inputStream The input stream that should contain the XML CLI
406     *      definition.
407     *  @param  propertyMap The target data structure for the values from the
408     *      command line.
409     *  @throws XMLStreamException  Cannot create a
410     *      {@link XMLEventReader}
411     *      instance for the given input stream.
412     *  @throws IOException Cannot read the given input stream.
413     */
414    private CLIDefinitionParser( final InputStream inputStream, final Map<String,Object> propertyMap ) throws XMLStreamException, IOException
415    {
416        m_PropertyMap = requireNonNullArgument( propertyMap, "propertyMap" );
417
418        //---* Get XML contents *----------------------------------------------
419        m_XMLContents = new String( requireNonNullArgument( inputStream, "inputStream" ).readAllBytes(), UTF8 );
420
421        //---* Create the event reader for parsing *---------------------------
422        final var xmlInputFactory = XMLInputFactory.newInstance();
423        xmlInputFactory.setXMLResolver( new CLIDefinitionResolver() );
424        m_EventReader = xmlInputFactory.createXMLEventReader( new StringReader( m_XMLContents ) );
425    }   //  CLIDefinitionParser()
426
427        /*---------*\
428    ====** Methods **==========================================================
429        \*---------*/
430    /**
431     *  <p>{@summary Creates the instance for the command line value handler
432     *  based on the given class for the type and class for the handler
433     *  implementation.} If {@code processClass} is {@code null}, the method
434     *  will search for a specialised handler class in the internal registry;
435     *  if none can be found, and {@code stringConverter} is not {@code null},
436     *  it creates an instance of
437     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.cli.SimpleCmdLineValueHandler}
438     *  with it. But if {@code stringConverter} is {@code null}, an exception
439     *  will be thrown.</p>
440     *  <p>If {@code processClass} is not {@code null}, it has to be a class
441     *  that implements
442     *  {@link CmdLineValueHandler}.
443     *  In that case that class will be instantiated.</p>
444     *
445     *  @param  <T> The type of the property the set.
446     *  @param  type    The class for the property to set.
447     *  @param  processClass    This is either the handler class or
448     *      {@code null}.
449     *  @param  stringConverter The
450     *      {@link StringConverter}
451     *      instance for the property; can be {@code null}.
452     *  @return The command line value handler instance.
453     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    A command line value handler
454     *      instance cannot be created.
455     */
456    @SuppressWarnings( {"unchecked", "rawtypes"} )
457    private final <T> CmdLineValueHandler<T> createHandler( final Class<? extends T> type, final Class<?> processClass, final StringConverter<? extends T> stringConverter ) throws IllegalArgumentException
458    {
459        final var propertyTypeIsEnum = requireNonNullArgument( type, "type" ).isEnum();
460        final BiConsumer<String, T> valueSetter = m_PropertyMap::put;
461        CmdLineValueHandler<T> retValue = null;
462        Class<? extends CmdLineValueHandler<?>> handlerClass = null;
463        if( isNull( processClass ) )
464        {
465            if( propertyTypeIsEnum )
466            {
467                retValue = new EnumValueHandler( type, valueSetter );
468            }
469            else
470            {
471                //---* Infer the handler class, if necessary *-----------------
472                final var foundHandlerClass = retrieveValueHandlerClass( type );
473                if( foundHandlerClass.isPresent() )
474                {
475                    handlerClass = foundHandlerClass.get();
476                }
477                else if( nonNull( stringConverter ) )
478                {
479                    retValue = new SimpleCmdLineValueHandler<>( valueSetter, stringConverter );
480                }
481            }
482        }
483        else
484        {
485            if( !CmdLineValueHandler.class.isAssignableFrom( processClass ) )
486            {
487                throw new IllegalArgumentException( "'%s' is neither a StringConverter nor a CmdLineValueHandler".formatted( processClass.getName() ) );
488            }
489
490            //---* We got a command line value handler *-----------------------
491            handlerClass = (Class<? extends CmdLineValueHandler<?>>) processClass;
492        }
493
494        if( isNull( retValue ) )
495        {
496            if( isNull( handlerClass ) )
497            {
498                throw new IllegalArgumentException( "Could not determine a class for the Command Line Value Handler" );
499            }
500            try
501            {
502                final var constructor = handlerClass.getConstructor( BiConsumer.class );
503                retValue = (CmdLineValueHandler<T>) constructor.newInstance( valueSetter );
504            }
505            catch( final InstantiationException | IllegalAccessException | IllegalArgumentException | InvocationTargetException | NoSuchMethodException | SecurityException e )
506            {
507                throw new IllegalArgumentException( "Unable to create value handler from '%s'".formatted( handlerClass.getName() ), e );
508            }
509        }
510
511        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
512        return retValue;
513    }   //  createHandler()
514
515    /**
516     *  <p>{@summary Creates the instance for the string converter based on the
517     *  given class for the type and class for the string converter
518     *  implementation.} If {@code stringConverterClass} is {@code null}, the
519     *  method will search for an implementation class in the internal
520     *  registry; if none can be found, {@code null} will be returned.</p>
521     *
522     *  @param  <T> The type of the property to convert.
523     *  @param  type    The class for the property to convert.
524     *  @param  stringConverterClass    The String converter class or
525     *      {@code null}.
526     *  @return The String converter instance.
527     */
528    @SuppressWarnings( {"unchecked", "rawtypes"} )
529    private final <T> StringConverter<T> createStringConverter( final Class<?> type, final Class<? extends StringConverter<?>> stringConverterClass )
530    {
531        requireNonNullArgument( type, "type" );
532
533        final StringConverter<T> retValue;
534        if( isNull( stringConverterClass ) )
535        {
536            if( type.isEnum() )
537            {
538                retValue = (StringConverter<T>) StringConverter.forEnum( (Class<? extends Enum>) type );
539            }
540            else
541            {
542                retValue = (StringConverter<T>) StringConverter.forClass( type ).orElse( null );
543            }
544        }
545        else
546        {
547            final var foundProvider = retrieveMethod( stringConverterClass, "provider" );
548            if( foundProvider.isPresent() )
549            {
550                try
551                {
552                    retValue = (StringConverter<T>) foundProvider.get().invoke( null );
553                }
554                catch( final IllegalAccessException | InvocationTargetException e )
555                {
556                    throw new IllegalArgumentException( format( MSG_InvalidStringConverter, stringConverterClass.getName() ), e );
557                }
558            }
559            else
560            {
561                try
562                {
563                    @SuppressWarnings( "unchecked" )
564                    final var constructor = (Constructor<StringConverter<T>>) stringConverterClass.getConstructor();
565                    retValue = constructor.newInstance();
566                }
567                catch( final NoSuchMethodException e )
568                {
569                    throw new IllegalArgumentException( "No default constructor for StringConverter: %s".formatted( stringConverterClass.getName() ), e );
570                }
571                catch( final InstantiationException | InvocationTargetException | IllegalAccessException e )
572                {
573                    throw new IllegalArgumentException( format( MSG_InvalidStringConverter, stringConverterClass.getName() ), e );
574                }
575            }
576        }
577
578        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
579        return retValue;
580    }   //  createStringConverter()
581
582    /**
583     *  Executes the parsing.
584     *
585     *  @return The parsed CLI definition.
586     *  @throws XMLStreamException  Cannot parse the given input stream.
587     */
588    @SuppressWarnings( "SwitchStatementWithTooManyBranches" )
589    private final List<CLIDefinition> execute() throws XMLStreamException
590    {
591        List<CLIDefinition> retValue = List.of();
592        try
593        {
594            while( m_EventReader.hasNext() )
595            {
596                final var event = m_EventReader.nextEvent();
597                switch( event.getEventType() )
598                {
599                    case ATTRIBUTE:
600                    case CDATA:
601                    case CHARACTERS:
602                    case END_ELEMENT:
603                        //noinspection UseOfSystemOutOrSystemErr
604                        out.printf( "%d: %s%n", event.getEventType(), event );
605                        throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_ExpectedStartEvent, event.toString() ), event.getLocation() );
606
607                    case START_ELEMENT:
608                    {
609                        final var startElement = event.asStartElement();
610                        final var name = startElement.getName();
611                        if( name.getLocalPart().equals( XMLELEMENT_CLIDefinition ) )
612                        {
613                            retValue = handleCLIDefinition( startElement );
614                        }
615                        else
616                        {
617                            throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_WrongElement1, XMLELEMENT_CLIDefinition, name.toString() ), event.getLocation() );
618                        }
619                        break;
620                    }
621
622                    case COMMENT:
623                    case DTD:
624                    case END_DOCUMENT:
625                    case ENTITY_DECLARATION:
626                    case NAMESPACE:
627                    case NOTATION_DECLARATION:
628                    case PROCESSING_INSTRUCTION:
629                    case SPACE:
630                    case START_DOCUMENT:
631                        break;
632
633                    default:
634                        //noinspection UseOfSystemOutOrSystemErr
635                        out.printf( "%d: %s%n", event.getEventType(), event );
636                        throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_UnexpectedEvent, event.toString() ), event.getLocation() );
637                }
638            }
639        }
640        finally
641        {
642            //noinspection ThrowFromFinallyBlock
643            m_EventReader.close();
644        }
645
646        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
647        return retValue;
648    }   //  execute()
649
650    /**
651     *  Retrieves the URL for the CLI definition DTD file from the resources.
652     *
653     *  @return The URL for the file.
654     */
655    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.1" )
656    public static final URL getCLIDefinitionDTDURL()
657    {
658        final var retValue = CLIDefinitionParser.class.getResource( format( "/%s", CLI_DEFINITION_DTD ) );
659
660        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
661        return retValue;
662    }   //  getCLIDefinitionDTDURL()
663
664    /**
665     *  Retrieves the URL for the CLI definition XSD file from the resources.
666     *
667     *  @return The URL for the file.
668     */
669    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.1" )
670    public static final URL getCLIDefinitionXSDURL()
671    {
672        final var retValue = CLIDefinitionParser.class.getResource( format( "/%s", CLI_DEFINITION_XSD ) );
673
674        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
675        return retValue;
676    }   //  getCLIDefinitionXSDURL()
677
678    /**
679     *  Handles the {@value #XMLELEMENT_Alias} element.
680     *
681     *  @param  element The current element.
682     *  @return The option alias.
683     *  @throws XMLStreamException  A problem occurred while parsing the
684     *      element.
685     */
686    @SuppressWarnings( {"SwitchStatementWithTooManyBranches", "SwitchStatementWithTooFewBranches"} )
687    private final String handleAlias( final StartElement element ) throws XMLStreamException
688    {
689        String retValue = null;
690
691        //---* Get the attributes *--------------------------------------------
692        final var attributes = element.getAttributes();
693        while( attributes.hasNext() )
694        {
695            final var attribute = attributes.next();
696            final var name = attribute.getName();
697            retValue = switch( name.getLocalPart() )
698            {
699                case XMLATTRIBUTE_Name -> processAttrName( attribute );
700                default -> throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_WrongAttribute, name.toString() ), element.getLocation() );
701            };
702        }
703
704        //---* Proceed parsing ... *-------------------------------------------
705        var proceed = true;
706        while( m_EventReader.hasNext() && proceed )
707        {
708            final var event = m_EventReader.nextEvent();
709            switch( event.getEventType() )
710            {
711                case ATTRIBUTE:
712                case CDATA:
713                case DTD:
714                case END_DOCUMENT:
715                case ENTITY_DECLARATION:
716                case NAMESPACE:
717                case NOTATION_DECLARATION:
718                case PROCESSING_INSTRUCTION:
719                case START_DOCUMENT:
720                case START_ELEMENT:
721                    throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_UnexpectedEvent, event.toString() ), event.getLocation() );
722
723                case END_ELEMENT:
724                {
725                    final var endElement = event.asEndElement();
726                    final var name = endElement.getName();
727                    if( !name.equals( element.getName() ) )
728                    {
729                        throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_UnexpectedEndEvent, event.toString(), element.getName(), name ), event.getLocation() );
730                    }
731                    proceed = false;
732                    break;
733                }
734
735                case CHARACTERS:
736                case COMMENT:
737                case SPACE:
738                    break;
739
740                default:
741                    //noinspection UseOfSystemOutOrSystemErr
742                    out.printf( "%d: %s\n", event.getEventType(), event );
743                    throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_UnexpectedEvent, event.toString() ), event.getLocation() );
744            }
745        }
746
747        if( isEmpty( retValue ) )
748        {
749            throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_MissingValue, XMLATTRIBUTE_Name ), element.getLocation() );
750        }
751
752        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
753        return retValue;
754    }   //  handleAlias()
755
756    /**
757     *  Handles the {@value #XMLELEMENT_CLIArgument} element.
758     *
759     *  @param  element The current element.
760     *  @return The parsed CLI definition.
761     *  @throws XMLStreamException  A problem occurred while parsing the
762     *      element.
763     */
764    @SuppressWarnings( {"SwitchStatementWithTooManyBranches", "NestedSwitchStatement", "OverlyLongMethod", "OverlyComplexMethod"} )
765    private CLIDefinition handleArgument( final StartElement element ) throws XMLStreamException
766    {
767        String format = null;
768        Class<? extends CmdLineValueHandler<?>> processorClass = null;
769        Class<? extends StringConverter<?>> stringConverterClass = null;
770        var index = -1;
771        var isMultiValue = false;
772        var isRequired = false;
773        String metaVar = null;
774        String propertyName = null;
775        Class<?> type = null;
776        String usage = null;
777        String usageKey = null;
778        CLIArgumentDefinition retValue = null;
779
780        //---* Get the attributes *--------------------------------------------
781        final var attributes = element.getAttributes();
782        while( attributes.hasNext() )
783        {
784            final var attribute = attributes.next();
785            final var name = attribute.getName();
786            switch( name.getLocalPart() )
787            {
788                case XMLATTRIBUTE_Handler -> processorClass = processAttrHandler( attribute );
789                case XMLATTRIBUTE_Index -> {
790                    try
791                    {
792                        index = Integer.parseInt( attribute.getValue() );
793                        if( index < 0 )
794                        {
795                            throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_InvalidValue, XMLATTRIBUTE_Index, Integer.toString( index ) ), attribute.getLocation() );
796                        }
797                    }
798                    catch( final NumberFormatException e )
799                    {
800                        final var xse = new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_InvalidValue, XMLATTRIBUTE_Index, attribute.getValue() ), attribute.getLocation(), e );
801                        xse.initCause( e );
802                        throw xse;
803                    }
804                }
805
806                case XMLATTRIBUTE_IsMultiValue -> isMultiValue = Boolean.parseBoolean( attribute.getValue() );
807                case XMLATTRIBUTE_IsRequired -> isRequired = Boolean.parseBoolean( attribute.getValue() );
808                case XMLATTRIBUTE_MetaVar -> metaVar = attribute.getValue();
809                case XMLATTRIBUTE_PropertyName -> propertyName = processAttrPropertyName( attribute );
810                case XMLATTRIBUTE_StringConversion -> stringConverterClass = processAttrStringConversion( attribute );
811                case XMLATTRIBUTE_Type -> type = processAttrType( attribute );
812                default -> throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_WrongAttribute, name.toString() ), element.getLocation() );
813            }
814        }
815
816        //---* Get the StringConverter instance *------------------------------
817        final StringConverter<?> stringConverter = createStringConverter( type, stringConverterClass );
818
819        //---* Get the handler instance *--------------------------------------
820        final CmdLineValueHandler<?> handler;
821        try
822        {
823            handler = createHandler( type, processorClass, stringConverter );
824        }
825        catch( final IllegalArgumentException e )
826        {
827            throw new XMLStreamException( "Cannot create Command Line Value Handler", e );
828        }
829
830        //---* Proceed parsing ... *-------------------------------------------
831        var proceed = true;
832        while( m_EventReader.hasNext() && proceed )
833        {
834            final var event = m_EventReader.nextEvent();
835            switch( event.getEventType() )
836            {
837                case ATTRIBUTE:
838                case CDATA:
839                case DTD:
840                case END_DOCUMENT:
841                case ENTITY_DECLARATION:
842                case NAMESPACE:
843                case NOTATION_DECLARATION:
844                case PROCESSING_INSTRUCTION:
845                case START_DOCUMENT:
846                    //noinspection UseOfSystemOutOrSystemErr
847                    out.printf( "%d: %s\n", event.getEventType(), event );
848                    throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_ExpectedStartEvent, event.toString() ), event.getLocation() );
849
850                case END_ELEMENT:
851                {
852                    final var endElement = event.asEndElement();
853                    final var name = endElement.getName();
854                    if( !name.equals( element.getName() ) )
855                    {
856                        throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_UnexpectedEndEvent, event.toString(), element.getName(), name ), event.getLocation() );
857                    }
858                    proceed = false;
859                    break;
860                }
861
862                case START_ELEMENT:
863                {
864                    final var startElement = event.asStartElement();
865                    final var name = startElement.getName();
866                    switch( name.getLocalPart() )
867                    {
868                        case XMLELEMENT_Format -> format = handleFormat( startElement );
869
870                        case XMLELEMENT_Usage ->
871                        {
872                            final var result = handleUsage( startElement );
873                            usageKey = result.get( XMLATTRIBUTE_Key );
874                            usage = result.get( XMLELEMENT_Usage );
875                        }
876
877                        default -> throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_WrongElement2, join( ", ", XMLELEMENT_Alias, XMLELEMENT_Format, XMLELEMENT_Usage ), name.toString() ), event.getLocation() );
878                    }
879                    break;
880                }
881
882                case CHARACTERS:
883                case COMMENT:
884                case SPACE:
885                    break;
886
887                default:
888                    //noinspection UseOfSystemOutOrSystemErr
889                    out.printf( "%d: %s\n", event.getEventType(), event );
890                    throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_UnexpectedEvent, event.toString() ), event.getLocation() );
891            }
892        }
893
894        //---* Create the return value *---------------------------------------
895        if( isEmptyOrBlank( metaVar ) )
896        {
897            metaVar = type.getSimpleName().toUpperCase( ROOT );
898        }
899        retValue = new CLIArgumentDefinition( propertyName, index, usage, usageKey, metaVar, isRequired, handler, isMultiValue, format );
900
901        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
902        return retValue;
903    }   //  handleArgument()
904
905    /**
906     *  Handles the {@value #XMLELEMENT_CLIDefinition} element.
907     *
908     *  @param  element The current element.
909     *  @return The parsed CLI definition.
910     *  @throws XMLStreamException  A problem occurred while parsing the
911     *      element.
912     */
913    @SuppressWarnings( {"SwitchStatementWithTooManyBranches", "NestedSwitchStatement"} )
914    private final List<CLIDefinition> handleCLIDefinition( final StartElement element ) throws XMLStreamException
915    {
916        final List<CLIDefinition> retValue = new ArrayList<>();
917        var proceed = true;
918        while( m_EventReader.hasNext() && proceed )
919        {
920            final var event = m_EventReader.nextEvent();
921            switch( event.getEventType() )
922            {
923                case ATTRIBUTE:
924                case CDATA:
925                case DTD:
926                case END_DOCUMENT:
927                case ENTITY_DECLARATION:
928                case NAMESPACE:
929                case NOTATION_DECLARATION:
930                case PROCESSING_INSTRUCTION:
931                case START_DOCUMENT:
932                    throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_ExpectedStartEvent, event.toString() ), event.getLocation() );
933
934                case END_ELEMENT:
935                {
936                    final var endElement = event.asEndElement();
937                    final var name = endElement.getName();
938                    if( !name.equals( element.getName() ) )
939                    {
940                        throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_UnexpectedEndEvent, event.toString(), element.getName(), name ), event.getLocation() );
941                    }
942                    proceed = false;
943                    break;
944                }
945
946                case START_ELEMENT:
947                {
948                    final var startElement = event.asStartElement();
949                    final var name = startElement.getName();
950                    switch( name.getLocalPart() )
951                    {
952                        case XMLELEMENT_CLIArgument -> retValue.add( handleArgument( startElement ) );
953                        case XMLELEMENT_CLIOption -> retValue.add( handleOption( startElement ) );
954                        default -> throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_WrongElement2, join( ", ", XMLELEMENT_CLIOption, XMLELEMENT_CLIArgument ), name.toString() ), event.getLocation() );
955                    }
956                    break;
957                }
958
959                case CHARACTERS:
960                case COMMENT:
961                case SPACE:
962                    break;
963
964                default:
965                    //noinspection UseOfSystemOutOrSystemErr
966                    out.printf( "%d: %s\n", event.getEventType(), event );
967                    throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_UnexpectedEvent, event.toString() ), event.getLocation() );
968            }
969        }
970
971        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
972        return retValue;
973    }   //  handleCLIDefinition()
974
975    /**
976     *  Handles the {@value #XMLELEMENT_Format} element.
977     *
978     *  @param  element The current element.
979     *  @return The format.
980     *  @throws XMLStreamException  A problem occurred while parsing the
981     *      element.
982     */
983    @SuppressWarnings( {"SwitchStatementWithTooManyBranches", "AssignmentToNull"} )
984    private final String handleFormat( final StartElement element ) throws XMLStreamException
985    {
986        String retValue = null;
987
988        var proceed = true;
989        while( m_EventReader.hasNext() && proceed )
990        {
991            final var event = m_EventReader.nextEvent();
992            switch( event.getEventType() )
993            {
994                case ATTRIBUTE:
995                case DTD:
996                case END_DOCUMENT:
997                case ENTITY_DECLARATION:
998                case NAMESPACE:
999                case NOTATION_DECLARATION:
1000                case PROCESSING_INSTRUCTION:
1001                case START_DOCUMENT:
1002                case START_ELEMENT:
1003                    throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_UnexpectedEvent, event.toString() ), event.getLocation() );
1004
1005                case END_ELEMENT:
1006                {
1007                    final var endElement = event.asEndElement();
1008                    final var name = endElement.getName();
1009                    if( !name.equals( element.getName() ) )
1010                    {
1011                        throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_UnexpectedEndEvent, event.toString(), element.getName(), name ), event.getLocation() );
1012                    }
1013                    proceed = false;
1014                    break;
1015                }
1016
1017                case CDATA:
1018                case CHARACTERS:
1019                {
1020                    final var characters = event.asCharacters();
1021                    retValue = characters.getData();
1022                    break;
1023                }
1024
1025                case COMMENT:
1026                case SPACE:
1027                    break;
1028
1029                default:
1030                    //noinspection UseOfSystemOutOrSystemErr
1031                    out.printf( "%d: %s\n", event.getEventType(), event );
1032                    throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_UnexpectedEvent, event.toString() ), event.getLocation() );
1033            }
1034        }
1035
1036        if( isEmpty( retValue ) ) retValue = null;
1037
1038        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1039        return retValue;
1040    }   //  handleFormat()
1041
1042    /**
1043     *  Handles the {@value #XMLELEMENT_CLIOption} element.
1044     *
1045     *  @param  element The current element.
1046     *  @return The parsed CLI definition.
1047     *  @throws XMLStreamException  A problem occurred while parsing the
1048     *      element.
1049     */
1050    @SuppressWarnings( {"SwitchStatementWithTooManyBranches", "NestedSwitchStatement", "OverlyLongMethod", "OverlyComplexMethod"} )
1051    private final CLIDefinition handleOption( final StartElement element ) throws XMLStreamException
1052    {
1053        String format = null;
1054        Class<? extends CmdLineValueHandler<?>> processorClass = null;
1055        Class<? extends StringConverter<?>> stringConverterClass = null;
1056        var isMultiValue = false;
1057        var isRequired = false;
1058        String metaVar = null;
1059        final List<String> names = new ArrayList<>();
1060        String propertyName = null;
1061        Class<?> type = null;
1062        String usage = null;
1063        String usageKey = null;
1064        CLIOptionDefinition retValue = null;
1065
1066        //---* Get the attributes *--------------------------------------------
1067        final var attributes = element.getAttributes();
1068        while( attributes.hasNext() )
1069        {
1070            final var attribute = attributes.next();
1071            final var name = attribute.getName();
1072            switch( name.getLocalPart() )
1073            {
1074                case XMLATTRIBUTE_Handler -> processorClass = processAttrHandler( attribute );
1075                case XMLATTRIBUTE_IsMultiValue -> isMultiValue = Boolean.parseBoolean( attribute.getValue() );
1076                case XMLATTRIBUTE_IsRequired -> isRequired = Boolean.parseBoolean( attribute.getValue() );
1077                case XMLATTRIBUTE_MetaVar -> metaVar = attribute.getValue();
1078                case XMLATTRIBUTE_Name -> names.add( processAttrName( attribute ) );
1079                case XMLATTRIBUTE_PropertyName -> propertyName = processAttrPropertyName( attribute );
1080                case XMLATTRIBUTE_StringConversion -> stringConverterClass = processAttrStringConversion( attribute );
1081                case XMLATTRIBUTE_Type -> type = processAttrType( attribute );
1082                default -> throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_WrongAttribute, name.toString() ), element.getLocation() );
1083            }
1084        }
1085
1086        //---* Get the StringConverter instance *------------------------------
1087        final StringConverter<?> stringConverter = createStringConverter( type, stringConverterClass );
1088
1089        //---* Get the handler instance *--------------------------------------
1090        final CmdLineValueHandler<?> handler;
1091        try
1092        {
1093            handler = createHandler( type, processorClass, stringConverter );
1094        }
1095        catch( final IllegalArgumentException e )
1096        {
1097            throw new XMLStreamException( "Cannot create Command Line Value Handler", e );
1098        }
1099
1100        //---* Proceed parsing ... *-------------------------------------------
1101        var proceed = true;
1102        while( m_EventReader.hasNext() && proceed )
1103        {
1104            final var event = m_EventReader.nextEvent();
1105            switch( event.getEventType() )
1106            {
1107                case ATTRIBUTE:
1108                case CDATA:
1109                case DTD:
1110                case END_DOCUMENT:
1111                case ENTITY_DECLARATION:
1112                case NAMESPACE:
1113                case NOTATION_DECLARATION:
1114                case PROCESSING_INSTRUCTION:
1115                case START_DOCUMENT:
1116                    //noinspection UseOfSystemOutOrSystemErr
1117                    out.printf( "%d: %s\n", event.getEventType(), event );
1118                    throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_ExpectedStartEvent, event.toString() ), event.getLocation() );
1119
1120                case END_ELEMENT:
1121                {
1122                    final var endElement = event.asEndElement();
1123                    final var name = endElement.getName();
1124                    if( !name.equals( element.getName() ) )
1125                    {
1126                        throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_UnexpectedEndEvent, event.toString(), element.getName(), name ), event.getLocation() );
1127                    }
1128                    proceed = false;
1129                    break;
1130                }
1131
1132                case START_ELEMENT:
1133                {
1134                    final var startElement = event.asStartElement();
1135                    final var name = startElement.getName();
1136                    switch( name.getLocalPart() )
1137                    {
1138                        case XMLELEMENT_Alias -> names.add( handleAlias( startElement ) );
1139                        case XMLELEMENT_Format -> format = handleFormat( startElement );
1140                        case XMLELEMENT_Usage ->
1141                        {
1142                            final var result = handleUsage( startElement );
1143                            usageKey = result.get( XMLATTRIBUTE_Key );
1144                            usage = result.get( XMLELEMENT_Usage );
1145                        }
1146                        default -> throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_WrongElement2, join( ", ", XMLELEMENT_Alias, XMLELEMENT_Format, XMLELEMENT_Usage ), name.toString() ), event.getLocation() );
1147                    }
1148                    break;
1149                }
1150
1151                case CHARACTERS:
1152                case COMMENT:
1153                case SPACE:
1154                    break;
1155
1156                default:
1157                    //noinspection UseOfSystemOutOrSystemErr
1158                    out.printf( "%d: %s\n", event.getEventType(), event );
1159                    throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_UnexpectedEvent, event.toString() ), event.getLocation() );
1160            }
1161        }
1162
1163        //---* Create the return value *---------------------------------------
1164        if( names.size() != new HashSet<>( names ).size() )
1165        {
1166            throw new XMLStreamException( "Duplicate option names", element.getLocation() );
1167        }
1168        if( isEmptyOrBlank( metaVar ) )
1169        {
1170            metaVar = type.getSimpleName().toUpperCase( ROOT );
1171        }
1172        retValue = new CLIOptionDefinition( propertyName, names, usage, usageKey, metaVar, isRequired, handler, isMultiValue, format );
1173
1174        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1175        return retValue;
1176    }   //  handleOption()
1177
1178    /**
1179     *  Handles the {@value #XMLELEMENT_Usage} element.
1180     *
1181     *  @param  element The current element.
1182     *  @return The usage and the usage key.
1183     *  @throws XMLStreamException  A problem occurred while parsing the
1184     *      element.
1185     */
1186    @SuppressWarnings( {"SwitchStatementWithTooFewBranches", "SwitchStatementWithTooManyBranches"} )
1187    private final Map<String,String> handleUsage( final StartElement element ) throws XMLStreamException
1188    {
1189        final Map<String,String> retValue = new HashMap<>();
1190
1191        //---* Get the attributes *--------------------------------------------
1192        final var attributes = element.getAttributes();
1193        while( attributes.hasNext() )
1194        {
1195            final var attribute = attributes.next();
1196            final var name = attribute.getName();
1197            switch( name.getLocalPart() )
1198            {
1199                case XMLATTRIBUTE_Key -> retValue.put( XMLATTRIBUTE_Key, attribute.getValue() );
1200                default -> throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_WrongAttribute, name.toString() ), element.getLocation() );
1201            }
1202        }
1203
1204        //---* Proceed parsing ... *-------------------------------------------
1205        var proceed = true;
1206        while( m_EventReader.hasNext() && proceed )
1207        {
1208            final var event = m_EventReader.nextEvent();
1209            switch( event.getEventType() )
1210            {
1211                case ATTRIBUTE:
1212                case DTD:
1213                case END_DOCUMENT:
1214                case ENTITY_DECLARATION:
1215                case NAMESPACE:
1216                case NOTATION_DECLARATION:
1217                case PROCESSING_INSTRUCTION:
1218                case START_DOCUMENT:
1219                case START_ELEMENT:
1220                    throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_UnexpectedEvent, event.toString() ), event.getLocation() );
1221
1222                case END_ELEMENT:
1223                {
1224                    final var endElement = event.asEndElement();
1225                    final var name = endElement.getName();
1226                    if( !name.equals( element.getName() ) )
1227                    {
1228                        throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_UnexpectedEndEvent, event.toString(), element.getName(), name ), event.getLocation() );
1229                    }
1230                    proceed = false;
1231                    break;
1232                }
1233
1234                case CDATA:
1235                case CHARACTERS:
1236                {
1237                    final var characters = event.asCharacters();
1238                    retValue.put( XMLELEMENT_Usage, characters.getData() );
1239                    break;
1240                }
1241
1242                case COMMENT:
1243                case SPACE:
1244                    break;
1245
1246                default:
1247                    //noinspection UseOfSystemOutOrSystemErr
1248                    out.printf( "%d: %s\n", event.getEventType(), event );
1249                    throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_UnexpectedEvent, event.toString() ), event.getLocation() );
1250            }
1251        }
1252
1253        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1254        return retValue;
1255    }   //  handleUsage()
1256
1257    /**
1258     *  Parses the given
1259     *  {@link InputStream}.
1260     *
1261     *  @param  inputStream The input stream that should contain the XML CLI
1262     *      definition.
1263     *  @param  propertyMap The target data structure for the values from the
1264     *      command line.
1265     *  @param  validate    {@code true} if the given XML should be validated
1266     *      against the schema {@code CLIDefinition.xsd} previous to parsing
1267     *      it, {@code false} if the validation can be omitted.
1268     *
1269     *  @return The parsed CLI definition.
1270     *  @throws XMLStreamException  Cannot parse the given input stream.
1271     *  @throws IOException Cannot read the given input stream.
1272     */
1273    public static final List<CLIDefinition> parse( final InputStream inputStream, final Map<String,Object> propertyMap, final boolean validate ) throws XMLStreamException, IOException
1274    {
1275        final var parser = new CLIDefinitionParser( inputStream, propertyMap );
1276        if( validate ) parser.validate();
1277        final var retValue = parser.execute();
1278
1279        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1280        return retValue;
1281    }   //  parse()
1282
1283    /**
1284     *  Processes the attribute {@value #XMLATTRIBUTE_Handler}.
1285     *
1286     *  @param  attribute   The attribute.
1287     *  @return The handler class.
1288     *  @throws XMLStreamException  The attribute is somehow invalid.
1289     */
1290    @SuppressWarnings( "unchecked" )
1291    private static final Class<? extends CmdLineValueHandler<?>> processAttrHandler( final Attribute attribute ) throws XMLStreamException
1292    {
1293
1294        final var name = attribute.getName();
1295
1296        final var value = attribute.getValue();
1297        final Class<?> result;
1298        if( isNotEmptyOrBlank( value ) )
1299        {
1300            try
1301            {
1302                result = Class.forName( value );
1303            }
1304            catch( final ClassNotFoundException e )
1305            {
1306                final var xse = new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_InvalidValue, name.toString(), value ), attribute.getLocation(), e );
1307                xse.initCause( e );
1308                throw xse;
1309            }
1310            if( !CmdLineValueHandler.class.isAssignableFrom( result ) )
1311            {
1312                throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_InvalidValue, name.toString(), result.getName() ), attribute.getLocation() );
1313            }
1314        }
1315        else
1316        {
1317            throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_MissingValue, name.toString() ), attribute.getLocation() );
1318        }
1319
1320        @SuppressWarnings( "RedundantExplicitVariableType" )
1321        final Class<? extends CmdLineValueHandler<?>> retValue = (Class<? extends CmdLineValueHandler<?>>) result;
1322
1323        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1324        return retValue;
1325    }   //  processAttrHandler()
1326
1327    /**
1328     *  Processes the attribute {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#XMLATTRIBUTE_Name}.
1329     *
1330     *  @param  attribute   The attribute.
1331     *  @return The property name.
1332     *  @throws XMLStreamException  The attribute is somehow invalid.
1333     */
1334    private static final String processAttrName( final Attribute attribute ) throws XMLStreamException
1335    {
1336        final var name = attribute.getName();
1337
1338        final var retValue = attribute.getValue();
1339        try
1340        {
1341            validateOptionName( retValue );
1342        }
1343        catch( final IllegalArgumentException e )
1344        {
1345            final var xse = new XMLStreamException( join( "\n", format( MSG_InvalidValue, name.toString(), retValue ), e.getMessage() ), attribute.getLocation(), e );
1346            xse.initCause( e );
1347            throw xse;
1348        }
1349
1350        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1351        return retValue;
1352    }   //  processAttrPropertyName()
1353
1354    /**
1355     *  Processes the attribute {@value #XMLATTRIBUTE_PropertyName}.
1356     *
1357     *  @param  attribute   The attribute.
1358     *  @return The property name.
1359     *  @throws XMLStreamException  The attribute is somehow invalid.
1360     */
1361    private static final String processAttrPropertyName( final Attribute attribute ) throws XMLStreamException
1362    {
1363        final var name = attribute.getName();
1364
1365        final var retValue = attribute.getValue();
1366        if( isNotEmptyOrBlank( retValue ) )
1367        {
1368            if( !isValidName( retValue ) )
1369            {
1370                throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_InvalidValue, name.toString(), retValue ), attribute.getLocation() );
1371            }
1372        }
1373        else
1374        {
1375            throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_MissingValue, name.toString() ), attribute.getLocation() );
1376        }
1377
1378        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1379        return retValue;
1380    }   //  processAttrPropertyName()
1381
1382    /**
1383     *  Processes the attribute {@value #XMLATTRIBUTE_StringConversion}.
1384     *
1385     *  @param  attribute   The attribute.
1386     *  @return The
1387     *      {@link StringConverter}
1388     *      implementation class.
1389     *  @throws XMLStreamException  The attribute is somehow invalid.
1390     */
1391    private static final Class<? extends StringConverter<?>> processAttrStringConversion( final Attribute attribute ) throws XMLStreamException
1392    {
1393        final var name = attribute.getName();
1394
1395        final var value = attribute.getValue();
1396        final Class<?> result;
1397        if( isNotEmptyOrBlank( value ) )
1398        {
1399            try
1400            {
1401                result = Class.forName( value );
1402            }
1403            catch( final ClassNotFoundException e )
1404            {
1405                final var xse = new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_InvalidValue, name.toString(), value ), attribute.getLocation(), e );
1406                xse.initCause( e );
1407                throw xse;
1408            }
1409            if( !StringConverter.class.isAssignableFrom( result ) )
1410            {
1411                throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_InvalidStringConverter, result.getName() ), attribute.getLocation() );
1412            }
1413        }
1414        else
1415        {
1416            throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_MissingValue, name.toString() ), attribute.getLocation() );
1417        }
1418
1419        @SuppressWarnings( "unchecked" )
1420        final var retValue = (Class<? extends StringConverter<?>>) result;
1421
1422        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1423        return retValue;
1424    }   //  processAttrStringConversion()
1425
1426    /**
1427     *  Processes the attribute {@value #XMLATTRIBUTE_Type}.
1428     *
1429     *  @param  attribute   The attribute.
1430     *  @return The class for the type.
1431     *  @throws XMLStreamException  The attribute is somehow invalid.
1432     */
1433    private static final Class<?> processAttrType( final Attribute attribute ) throws XMLStreamException
1434    {
1435        final Class<?> retValue;
1436
1437        final var name = attribute.getName();
1438
1439        final var value = attribute.getValue();
1440        if( isNotEmptyOrBlank( value ) )
1441        {
1442            try
1443            {
1444                retValue = Class.forName( value );
1445            }
1446            catch( final ClassNotFoundException e )
1447            {
1448                final var xse = new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_InvalidValue, name.toString(), value ), attribute.getLocation(), e );
1449                xse.initCause( e );
1450                throw xse;
1451            }
1452        }
1453        else
1454        {
1455            throw new XMLStreamException( format( MSG_MissingValue, name.toString() ), attribute.getLocation() );
1456        }
1457
1458        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1459        return retValue;
1460    }   //  processAttrType()
1461
1462    /**
1463     *  Retrieves the CLI definition DTD file from the resources.
1464     *
1465     *  @return The input stream for the file.
1466     */
1467    @SuppressWarnings( "StaticMethodOnlyUsedInOneClass" )
1468    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.1" )
1469    public static final InputStream retrieveCLIDefinitionDTD()
1470    {
1471        final var retValue = CLIDefinitionParser.class.getResourceAsStream( format( "/%s", CLI_DEFINITION_DTD ) );
1472
1473        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1474        return retValue;
1475    }   //  retrieveCLIDefinitionDTD()
1476
1477    /**
1478     *  Retrieves the CLI definition XSD file from the resources.
1479     *
1480     *  @return The input stream for the file.
1481     */
1482    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.1" )
1483    public static final InputStream retrieveCLIDefinitionXSD()
1484    {
1485        final var retValue = CLIDefinitionParser.class.getResourceAsStream( format( "/%s", CLI_DEFINITION_XSD ) );
1486
1487        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1488        return retValue;
1489    }   //  retrieveCLIDefinitionXSD()
1490
1491    /**
1492     *  <p>{@summary Retrieves the class for the value handler if the property
1493     *  class is not an {@code enum} type.}</p>
1494     *  <p>{@code enum} types have to be handled separately.</p>
1495     *
1496     *  @param  propertyClass   The class of the property that should be set.
1497     *  @return An instance of
1498     *      {@link Optional}
1499     *      that holds the effective handler class if the property class is not
1500     *      an {@code enum}.
1501     */
1502    private final Optional<Class<? extends CmdLineValueHandler<?>>> retrieveValueHandlerClass( final Class<?> propertyClass )
1503    {
1504        final Optional<Class<? extends CmdLineValueHandler<?>>> retValue = requireNonNullArgument( propertyClass, "propertyClass" ).isEnum()
1505            ? Optional.empty()
1506            : Optional.ofNullable( m_HandlerClasses.get( propertyClass ) );
1507
1508        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1509        return retValue;
1510    }   //  retrieveValueHandlerClass()
1511
1512    /**
1513     *  Validates the given XML.
1514     *
1515     *  @throws XMLStreamException  The validation failed.
1516     *  @throws IOException Cannot read the given input stream.
1517     */
1518    private final void validate() throws IOException, XMLStreamException
1519    {
1520        //---* Create the stream reader for validation *-----------------------
1521        final var xmlInputFactory = XMLInputFactory.newInstance();
1522        final var streamReader = xmlInputFactory.createXMLStreamReader( new StringReader( m_XMLContents ) );
1523
1524        //---* Create the schema factory for the validation *------------------
1525        final var schemaFactory = SchemaFactory.newInstance( W3C_XML_SCHEMA_NS_URI );
1526        try
1527        {
1528            final var schema = schemaFactory.newSchema( getCLIDefinitionXSDURL() );
1529
1530            //---* Create the validator *--------------------------------------
1531            final var validator = schema.newValidator();
1532
1533            //---* Validate *--------------------------------------------------
1534            validator.validate( new StAXSource( streamReader ) );
1535        }
1536        catch( @SuppressWarnings( "CaughtExceptionImmediatelyRethrown" ) final IOException e )
1537        {
1538            //---* Should not happen ... *-------------------------------------
1539            throw e;
1540        }
1541        catch( final SAXParseException e )
1542        {
1543            final var xse = new XMLStreamException( e.getMessage(), new ExceptionLocation( e ), e );
1544            xse.initCause( e );
1545            throw xse;
1546        }
1547        catch( final SAXException e )
1548        {
1549            throw new XMLStreamException( e.getMessage(), e );
1550        }
1551    }   //  validate()
1552}
1553//  class CLIDefinitionParser
1554
1555/*
1556 *  End of File
1557 */
